title-group.article-title: Lease vs. Purchase Decisions: A Survey of Current Practice

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1977 Board of Regents of the University of Wisconsin System

abstract.p: Perhaps no other issue in financial management, with the possible exception of the debate on the existence of the firm's optimal capital structure, has inspired such sustained interest in the academic literature as the lease versus purchase decision. Yet among the wealth of material that has appeared, no effort has been made to assess the state of the art in current practice. This paper presents the results of a survey of the lease versus purchase methodologies currently being employed by some of the nation's largest corporations.
